description: Provide precise Bazi (Chinese metaphysical) calculations to empower AI agents with accurate personality and destiny insights. Enable reliable and community-driven Bazi data services for applications in fortune-telling and Chinese metaphysics. Join a collaborative platform to advance traditional cultural analysis with AI.

capabilities.name: getBaziDetail
capabilities.description: 根据时间（公历或农历）、性别来获取八字信息。solarDatetime和lunarDatetime必须传且只传其中一个。

capabilities.name: getSolarTimes
capabilities.description: 根据八字获取公历时间列表。返回的时间格式为：YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss。例如时间1998年7月31日下午2点整表示为：1998-07-31 14:00:00

capabilities.name: getChineseCalendar
capabilities.description: 获取指定公历时间（默认今天）的黄历信息。

capabilities.name: buildBaziFromLunarDatetime
capabilities.description: 根据农历时间、性别来获取八字信息。

capabilities.name: buildBaziFromSolarDatetime
capabilities.description: 根据阳历时间、性别来获取八字信息。
